content: अक्लिष्ट {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. त.] {@--1@} Unwearied, untroubled, not annoyed, undisturbed, indefatigable. {@--2@} Not marred, unimpaired,; इदमुपनतमेवं रूपमक्लिष्टकांति <ls>Ś. 5. 19</ls> of unimpaired or unblemished beauty; अन्यथा कथमियं °ता लावण्यस्य <ls>K. 12</ls> unmarred state, perfection. {@--3@} Not laboured or elaborate.
